participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Jordan enjoys meeting new people and often spends time at the gym. He is a bit of a free spirit, preferring to stay unattached.
participant_1.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Caring and nurturing, Samantha has a strong bond with her pets and enjoys creative projects. She is practical and hands-on, always looking for ways to improve her living space.
participant_2.background: i have 5cats. my cats are very special to me. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.
